titleStmt.title: A salve for every sore, or, A collection of promises out of the whole Book of God and is the Christian centurions infallible ground of conscience, or his poore soules most assured comfortable companion at all times and in all things ... / by Phillip Skippon.
titleStmt.author: Skippon, Philip, d. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for Samuel Enderby,
